params.usdcAmount: Amount of USDC to use (must be  maxBuyAndBurnUSDC)

allocate(uint256).notice: Allocate USDC from vault to strategy

buyAndBurn(uint256,uint256).notice: Execute buy and burn - PERMISSIONLESS, anyone can call

canBuyAndBurn().notice: Check if buyAndBurn can be called

maxBuyAndBurnUSDC().notice: Calculate max USDC that can be used for buyAndBurn

rescueToken(address,uint256).notice: Rescue stuck tokens (not USDC or NOVIS)
